title: S1 E1 - Days Gone By
short_description: Rick searches for his family after emerging from a coma into a world terrorised by zombies. Morgan and Duane help teach Rick the new rules for survival..

title: S1 E2 - Guts
short_description: After the attack on the camp, Rick leads the group to safety while dealing with the dangers of the world around them.

title: S1 E3 - Tell It to the Frogs
short_description: Rick reunites with his family but must navigate the complex relationships in the group while dealing with the new threats they face.

title: S1 E4 - Vatos
short_description: Rick's mission to Atlanta is jeopardized when things go awry. Jim becomes unhinged in camp.

title: S1 E5 - Wildfire
short_description: Rick leads the group to the CDC after the attack. Jim must make a terrible life and death decision.

title: S1 E6 - TS-19
short_description: Season 1 finale. Rick and the group are allowed into the CDC by a strange doctor. But all is not what it seems in their newfound haven.
